title: Mastering Accounting Basics: Mobile Accounting Learning with Examples and Problems

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Arithmetic Skills and Understanding of Basic Financial Statement Structures
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning, structured in 10-minute modules with real-time feedback via formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can identify components of an income statement with 80% accuracy by analyzing real accounting cases.
Learners can apply journal entry procedures with over 70% accuracy in problem situations similar to provided examples.
Learners can complete and submit a simple financial statement creation task within 15 minutes on a mobile platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
